comments:
I upgrade the internal appserver plugin to Tomcat 5.5 and the received the following error when I tried to access the help.

The debugged the plugin and everything seems to be ok.  The embedded Appserver is starting but the address seems always to be null.


ERROR:

The embedded application server could not run help web application.

Andrew from bug 98371 may contribute a fix to make this upgrade happen. There are always some unforeseen problems that arise; incorrect assumptions that no longer hold, for example. If you'd like to pitch in, feel free to work with Andrew.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 98371 ***
